TITLE: Individualized Instruction
DEF: Adapting instruction to students' individual interests, strengths, and needs.
TASK: The Individualized Instruction pattern plays a pivotal role in AI augmented instruction. It provides resources to meet the diverse learning needs of students by tailoring instructional methods and materials to individual aptitudes, interests, and readiness levels. Strategies include: using formative assessments, offering flexible learning activities, and implementing individualized assets through learner-responsive prompt generators.
